name: Vishnu Haridas
title: Mobile Applications Developer
summary: Senior Mobile Engineer with 9+ years of experience delivering secure, high-performance client-facing mobile applications across iOS and Android. Expertise in React Native, mobile architecture, CI/CD automation, API integration, and performance optimization. Experienced in aligning development practices with enterprise governance, security, and release management standards.
